# Discord Chat Analysis for ü™ô‚îÇhyper Channel

## 1. Summary
The chat segment primarily revolves around community concerns regarding the Hyperfy token's declining value and perceived lack of management. Multiple users express frustration about the token's performance, with some suggesting it could approach zero value. The discussion highlights a disconnect between platform development and token value management. When questioned, Ashxn (likely a team member) notes that founders have 15% vesting over three years and suggests users should make their own judgments based on the platform's technology and economics. Community members request more active token management, clearer tokenomics, and a visible roadmap. There are concerns about token utility, with some users suggesting minimum liquidity provision or market making to stabilize the price. The conversation reveals tension between focusing on technical development versus token value preservation, with most participants advocating for more attention to the latter.
